text: Magnitude 6.8 earthquake hits Mindanao. Multiple buildings collapsed, please stay safe!
I can't believe this is happening. The entire downtown is underwater #ManilaFlooding
Our community center is now open as an evacuation site. Food and water available. #TyphoonResponse
Still shaking from the earthquake. Everyone OK? #MindanaoQuake
Help needed in Barangay San Roque! Several families trapped by rising water.
Tulong po! Lubog na ang buong bahay namin sa baha! #RescuePH
Updates: Roads to Davao City remain impassable due to landslides. Avoid travel.
We are safe and have enough supplies. Stay strong everyone! #ResiliencePH
Just felt another aftershock. When will this end? #EarthquakePH
Distribution of relief goods will begin at 3PM today at the municipal hall.
